ygData.subject: RE: about the new enchant items (long rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: Giving us the ability to enchant items would not add anything to our class to unbalance it vs. other casting classes. It is just a continution of our current
ygData.messageBody:
Giving us the ability to enchant items would not add anything to our class
to unbalance it vs. other casting classes. It is just a continution of our
current enchant metals line. It is what our class is about. There are lots
of jewelcrafters out there that aren't enchanters, just as there will be a
lot of people who aren't enchanters crafting magic weapons and armor if we
get the ability to enchant ore in the future. This isn't an 'addition' to
our class, this is finally delivering what was promised...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: XIII [SMTP:dlepriol@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 3:18 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] about the new enchant items (long rant)
>
> From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
>
> Party pooper, party pooper. Ok you know the song, this time I fill the
> role
> :).
>
> May I point out that the message said that the code was going to be
> implemented, not that -we- enchanters are going to benefit from it. True,
> it was stated in the book we could do it, but at no time in B4 it was in
> effect, and, according to EQE, we received other benefits to make up for
> it.
>
> As I see it, such thing would overbalance us (enchanters) in regard
> of
> other pure spell user classes. So either the benefit will be too small to
> even consider it or too huge and Verant might take out something in return
> to balance our classe again. Don't tell me we're nerfed now. We were,
> true,
> but that was sometime ago and from my point of view we are rather balanced
> regarding other pure spell users. To sum up we have our "niche".
>
> So, the idea is: By talking here, and offering Verant options to
> consider
> we may have a say in the matter and make our class fuller in the way -we-
> see it. What I would like to see discussed here is : What can we give up
> to
> have a 'proper' enchantment line of spells?. Or are we just to receive
> this
> new ability/spell/line of spells without giving up anything?.
>
> As stated above, I dont think we can't expect a 'useful' line of
> enchantment's spells unless we give up something in exchange. Thinking
> back
> of Beta, there was a line of spells we didn't have but nonetheless still
> managed to survive and prosper : Pet line of spells. Plus they don't fit
> enchanters very well . On the other hand, this line form the very core of
> most of our solo strategies so losing it wouldn't be a small thing.
>
> This is just an example, a topic's starter. Feel free to agree,
> disagree
> or tell me to shut up. Once again my aim to to talk things out here first
> and offer something (petition/ EQE/ you name it) constructive to Verant
> before we see something not implemented or half implemented in place.
>
> Best,
> Ibnabeth / Karana
> still going up
